channel.title: Management on Recency Bias
channel.description: Recent content in Management on Recency Bias

item.title: Why I Left Activemall
item.description: TL;DR 10 things that require zero talent : being on time work ethic effort body language energy attitude passion being coach-able doing extra being prepared Before Activemall It was 2015. I was leaving Altfactor because they split and in the process, they killed the most interesting project I've ever worked on. That project was an awesome second screen smart TV application, that allowed the user to interact with a smart TV from a mobile device like a table or phone.
